languages.text: "Быть может, обойдемся без выступлений и ролей? Еще есть шанс договориться".
"How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
languages.original_text: "Быть может, обойдемся без выступлений и ролей? Еще есть шанс договориться".

traits.locale_text: "How about we make do without roles and performances? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
"How about we make do without roles and performances? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
"How about we make do without roles and tomfoolery? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
"How about we make do without roles and tomfoolery? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
"How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."
"How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

languages.text: « Oublions ces histoires de rôles et de postures artificieuses ! Nous pouvons encore trouver un accord. »
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: « Oublions ces histoires de rôles et autres balivernes ! Nous pouvons encore trouver un accord. »

languages.text: “这场角色扮演的闹剧就到此为止吧，怎么样？我们仍然有机会达成协议。”
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: “这场角色扮演的胡闹就到此为止吧，怎么样？我们仍然有机会达成协议。”

languages.text: 「役割や見せかけは抜きでやってみないか？まだ交渉はできるだろう」
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: 「役割や見せかけは抜きでやってみないか？まだ交渉はできるだろう」

languages.text: "Wie wäre es, wenn wir auf Rollen und den ganzen Unsinn verzichten? Noch haben wir die Chance für ein Geschäft."
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: "Wie wäre es, wenn wir auf Rollen und den ganzen Unsinn verzichten? Noch haben wir die Chance für ein Geschäft."

languages.text: «¿Y si prescindimos de interpretar papeles y postureo? Aún estamos a tiempo de llegar a un acuerdo».
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si prescindimos de interpretar papeles y demás sandeces? Aún estamos a tiempo de llegar a un acuerdo».

languages.text: "Rol kesmeyi ve yapmacık konuşmayı bir kenara bırakalım mı? Hâlâ anlaşabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "How about we make do without roles and posturing? There is still a chance to strike a deal."

traits.locale_text: "Rol kesmeyi ve yapmacık konuşmayı bir kenara bırakalım mı? Hâlâ bir anlaşmaya varabiliriz."
